repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:xenial
LABEL maintainer="Sphinx Team <https://github.com/sphinx-doc/sphinx>"

RUN mkdir /docs
RUN apt-get update \
 && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
      curl \
      git \
      graphviz \
      make \
      python3 \
      python3-dev \
      python3-pip \
      python3-pil \
      unzip \
      vim \
 && apt-get autoremove \
 && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir Sphinx==2.0.1
